# Calanoida

This order of copepods are characterized by:

-   Large
-   Sausage-shaped body
-   Long antennae (longer than prosome)

![](calanoids/calanoid.png)


There are many calanoids in the Delta:

-   *Acartia* spp.
-   *Acartiella* spp.
-   *Diaptomus* spp.
-   *Eurytemora affinis*
-   *Osphranticum* spp.
-   *Pseudodiaptomus forbesi*
-   *Pseudodiaptomus marinus*
-   *Sinocalanus doerri*
-   *Tortanus* spp.

Each genus (will have) their separate page
